Congratulations! You've created a project.
Follow these steps to test out, customize and deploy an application using this project.

    Create a project, either from an existing template or a custom project.

    Before previewing set up at least one of each user type for the project.

    • Create a new {{userForm.title}}

    Change an existing form within the project, such as adding, editing or removing a field, and see it update in the preview application.

    • Go to the Forms section and modify a form.
    • Return to Preview and find the form in the demo application.

    Set up how you want to send emails, store files and send your data within your project.

    • Edit the project Email Provider settings
    • Edit the project File Storage settings
    • Edit the project Data Connectors settings

    Make a copy of the demo application on your computer so that it can be customized and deployed.

    • Go to the Local App Development page

    Add a new form to your project with your own custom fields and actions.

    • Go to the create a form page.
    • Use the <formio> embed tag to add the new form to your application.

    Build and deploy your application to a host or CDN.

    • Go to the Launch page
